<リージョン通行設定250:8>

<リージョン通行設定255:4>

parameters:
\CL Lex became king and fundamentally reformed the royal
palace.

\CL The Senate, which had deteriorated in its relationship
with Queen Caron, immediately held a discussion with the
Terios Church and made efforts to improve their
relationship.

\CL The people welcomed the young king who took up the sword
and sat on the throne.

\CL Comparing Lex to the founding king, they praised him as
the Hero King and insulted Queen Caron, who had stolen the
throne, as a poisonous and promiscuous woman.

\CL Once Lex establishes a solid support base within the
country, he begins preparing for a new action. This is the
great achievement that his father could not accomplish, the
conquest of the neighboring country, Tarasa.

\CL The fierce young king disregarded the advice of his
subordinates and the Senate, and initiated a war. It had
only been about three years since he became king, so it was
a premature start to the war.

\CL The war, which started with insufficient preparation in
all aspects, initially saw the empire, which had superior
strength, gaining the advantage in battle.

\CL However, by the time they landed in Tarasa, the imperial
army was completely exhausted.

\CL The genius of war, Atu, was absent from the imperial
army, and there was no one else who could replace him in a
short period of time.

\CL The Imperial Army came to a complete halt upon landing in
Tarasa.

\CL The expulsion of General Atu was not only a loss of a
strategic piece, but also a significant blow to the morale
of the soldiers on the battlefield.

\CL King Lex would come to realize the greatness of the
Empire's eldest brother once again.
\CL However, we cannot afford to stop our progress.

\CL Lex strongly requested mobilization from the Senate and
nobles. Eventually, it would turn into directives and
orders.

\CL Due to the opposition from the Senate and nobles, Lex
ended up making enemies both internally and externally.
There was no time for rest, and the figure of the young hero
was no longer there.

\CL The hero king who sat on the imperial throne has
disappeared. In his place, a dragon wearing a crown filled
with suspicion and paranoia was seated on the throne.

Priestess Sophia: Why are you dressed in armor? Are you
actually going to the battlefield!?

King Lex: On that day, when I reclaimed the throne, I was
wearing this. I must personally go to the battlefield and
boost the morale of the soldiers.

Priestess Sophia: With all due respect, I would like to
offer my advice. I believe we are not at such a stage yet.

Priestess Sophia: I receive messages from the Senate and
nobles asking for advice. They say that if any more imperial
blood is shed, conquering Tarasa will be impossible.

Priestess Sophia: I understand that it is a difficult
decision, but the top priority is the stability of the
Empire. Shouldn't we consider a 'change in direction'
here...?

Priestess Sophia: I understand that it may be impolite, but
as a loyal subject, please make the decision!

King Lex: You are the only person who speaks their mind
without hesitation, Sophia. Your advice has led to the
resolution of many issues within the empire.
Priestess Sophia: ...It's a waste, your words.

King Lex: I have no choice but to listen to your advice,
not as the king of the empire, but as Lex.
Priestess Sophia: Lord Lex...I-I apologize, King Lex!

King Lex: Hahaha, we're not formal with each other, right?
Just like usual, it's fine to call me Lex and Sophia in this
place.
Priestess Sophia: Yes, Lord Lex... Thank you very much.

King Lex: Those who have come to consult with you should
include members of the Senate, nobles, and likely even
prominent merchants.

King Lex: Is Senator Pido among them, the noble of the
Senate?

Priestess Sophia: Yes, I have been emphasizing the
importance of the food issue. If war and crop failure
coincide, there is a possibility of famine and starvation
within the country.

Priestess Sophia: I have taken the liberty of holding a
letter, including his, and I have also heard the general
outline, so please go ahead and tell me--

King Lex: I see, is that so! Do you find it more
comfortable being with [that man] than with me?!

King Lex: You filthy whore... You're just like Caron, a
prostitute who deceives the nation.

King Lex: I thought something was strange! You were
colluding with the Senate and the nobles to hinder my war,
weren't you?!

King Lex: You're nothing but a former torturer! Hahaha,
tired of playing priestess, now you've switched to being a
whore!

King Lex: If you have an explanation, then answer me! Come
on, answer me with words that will convince me!

Priestess Sophia: I am a deeply sinful person... I have
accumulated sins as both Alicia and Sophia...

Priestess Sophia: I won't ask you to believe in me, but
please let me pray as an individual, not as a priestess...

Priestess Sophia: I am neither an empress nor someone who
sits on the throne...

Priestess Sophia: Lord Lex, I will continue to pray for
your fortune.

Priestess Sophia: In the midst of my dark life... the time
I spent with you was radiant and beautiful.
Priestess Sophia: Thank you... my... beloved...

King Lex: Someone come, hurry up! Bring someone who can
heal immediately!

King Lex's Royal Guard: What is this...!? We must heal Lady
Sophia's wounds, hurry!

King Lex's Royal Guard: Inform the palace that there are
thieves! Now, King Lex, let's go to a safe place--

King Lex's Royal Guard: King Lex, the blood on that
sword... could it be...

King Lex: There is a noble from the Senate who made me draw
my sword, Pido. Detain him immediately.

King Lex's Royal Guard: U-Understood! I will immediately
send a messenger to the campus on a fast horse...!
King Lex: I will definitely take revenge.

\CL After stabbing Sophia, Lex became the embodiment of a
Mad King.

\CL Before that, there were reckless orders, but there was a
consistent cause of conquering Tarasa, and there were many
supporters.

\CL However, after this night, the only consistent thing
that was done was purging.

\CL From the Senate, nobles, merchants, soldiers, to the
citizens, there were no exceptions. The entire empire
trembled in fear at the appearance of the third [Dragon].

\CL Lex, who had maintained neutrality, eventually targeted
the Terios Church, the Magic Academy, and even the
Adventurer's Guild for attack.

\CL The Senate has decided to subdue the Mad King Lex. They
formally requested the Adventurer's Guild, Futera, to
undertake this task, and Agonia accepted it.

\CL Clea and the others will once again fight to reclaim the
throne.

\CL However, unlike the previous attempt to reclaim the
throne, the battlefield this time is the entire empire.

\CL It was difficult to overturn the overwhelming difference
in military strength, and while losing members, they were
forced to flee to the Mucos region.
\CL After that, Agonia boldly moved all the way to Tarasa.

\CL They confirmed that their interests aligned in subduing
Lex, and temporarily joined forces in order to bring the war
to an early end.

\CL The Adventurer's Guild, Futera, is a symbol of freedom.
Agonia couldn't let that be broken.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置
マップが見つからないため雰囲気が近いマップで仮置き

Rex, after becoming king, radically reformed the inside of
the royal palace.

The Senate, which had a deteriorating relationship due to
Queen Caron, immediately held a discussion with the Terios
Church and worked towards improving their relationship.

The people welcomed the young king who took up his sword and
sat on the throne.

Rex, who was likened to the king of founding the nation, was
praised as the Hero King, while Queen Caron, who had stolen
the throne, was cursed as a poisonous woman and a
prostitute.

After establishing a support base within the country, Rex
begins preparing for a new action. It is the great
achievement that his father could not accomplish, the
conquest of the neighboring country, Tarasa.

The fierce young king disregarded the advice of his
subordinates and the Senate, and initiated a war. It had
only been about three years since he became king, so it was
a premature start to the war.

The war, which started with a lack of preparation in all
aspects, saw the empire side, which was superior in its own
strength, gain an advantage in the early stages of the
battle.

However, by the time they landed in Tarasa, the Imperial
Army was completely exhausted.

The genius of war, Atu, was absent from the Imperial Army,
and there was no one else who could replace him in a short
period of time.

The Imperial Army completely came to a halt upon landing in
Tarasa.

The expulsion of General Atu was not only a loss of a
strategic piece, but also a significant blow to the morale
of the soldiers on the battlefield.

King Rex would come to realize the greatness of the Empire's
eldest brother.
However, we cannot afford to stop our progress.

Rex strongly requested mobilization from the Senate and
nobles. Eventually, it would turn into directives and
orders.

Due to the opposition from the Senate and nobles, Rex ends
up making enemies both domestically and internationally.

There was no time for rest, and the figure of the young hero
was no longer there. The hero king who sat on the imperial
throne had disappeared.

On the throne sat a dragon wearing a crown, plagued by
suspicion and paranoia--.

Priestess Sophia: Why are you dressed in armor? Are you
actually going to the battlefield!?

King Rex: On that day, when I reclaimed the throne, I was
wearing this. I must personally go to the battlefield and
boost the morale of the soldiers.

Priestess Sophia: With all due respect, I would like to
offer my advice. I believe we are not at a stage where such
actions are necessary.

Priestess Sophia: I receive messages from the Senate and
the nobles, asking for advice. They say that if any more
blood of the Empire is shed, it will be beyond the point of
conquering Tarasa.

Priestess Sophia: I understand that it is a difficult
decision, but the top priority is the stability of the
Empire. Shouldn't we consider a 'retreat' here...?

Priestess Sophia: I apologize for my rudeness, as a loyal
subject, please make the decision!

King Rex: You are the only person who speaks their mind
without hesitation, Sophia. Your advice has led to the
resolution of many issues within the empire.
Priestess Sophia: ...It's a waste, your words.

King Rex: I have no choice but to listen to your advice,
not as the king of the empire, but as Rex.
Priestess Sophia: Lord Rex... I-I apologize, King Rex!

King Rex: Hahaha, it's not like we're formal here. You can
just call me Rex, as usual, Sophia.
Priestess Sophia: Yes, Lord Rex... Thank you very much.

King Rex: The people who came to consult with you should
include members of the Senate, nobles, and probably even
influential merchants.

King Rex: Was Senator Pido among them, the noble of the
Senate?

Priestess Sophia: Yes, I have been emphasizing the
importance of the food issue. If war and crop failure
coincide, there is a possibility of famine and starvation
within the country.

Priestess Sophia: I have taken the liberty of holding onto
a letter, including his. I have also heard the general
outline, so please continue with your story--

King Rex: I see, is that so! Are you more comfortable being
around [that man] than me!?

King Rex: You filthy whore... You're just like Caron, a
prostitute who deceives the nation.

King Rex: I thought something was strange! You were
colluding with the Senate and the nobles to hinder my war,
weren't you!?

King Rex: You're just a former torturer after all! Hahaha,
tired of playing priestess, now you're switching to being a
whore!

King Rex: If you have an explanation, then answer me! Come
on, answer me with words that will convince me!

Priestess Sophia: I am a deeply sinful person... As Alicia
and as Sophia, I have accumulated sins...

Priestess Sophia: I won't ask you to believe in me, but
please allow me to pray as an individual, not just as a
priestess...

Priestess Sophia: I am neither an empress nor someone who
sits on the throne...

Priestess Sophia: Lord Rex, I will continue to pray for
your fortune.

Priestess Sophia: In the midst of my dark life... the time
I spent with you was dazzling and beautiful.
Priestess Sophia: Thank you... my... beloved...

King Rex: Someone come, hurry up! Bring someone who can
provide treatment right away!

King Rex's Royal Guard: What is this...!? We must heal Lady
Sophia's wounds, hurry!

King Rex's Royal Guard: Inform the palace that there are
thieves! Now, King Rex, let's go to a safe place--

King Rex's Royal Guard: King Rex, the blood on that
sword... could it be...

King Rex: There is a noble from the Senate who made me draw
my sword, Pido. Detain him immediately.

King Rex's Royal Guard: U-Understood! We will send a
messenger to the campus on a fast horse...!
King Rex: I will definitely take revenge.

After stabbing Sophia to death, Rex became the embodiment of
a Mad King.

Before that, there were reckless orders, but there was a
consistent cause of conquering Tarasa, and there were many
supporters.

However, after this night, the only thing that was
consistently carried out was purges.

From the Senate, nobles, merchants, soldiers, to the
citizens, there were no exceptions. The entire empire
trembled in fear at the appearance of the third [Dragon].

Rex, who had maintained neutrality, eventually targeted the
Terios Church, the Magic Academy, and even the Adventurer's
Guild for attack.

The Senate has decided to subdue the Mad King Rex. They
formally requested the Adventurer's Guild, Futera, to
undertake this task, and Agonia accepted it.

Clea and the others will once again fight to reclaim the
throne.

However, unlike the previous attempt to reclaim the throne,
the battlefield this time is the entire empire.

It was difficult to overturn the overwhelming difference in
military strength, and while losing members, they were
forced to flee to the Mucos region.
Afterwards, Agonia boldly moved all the way to Tarasa.

Confirming that our interests align in subduing Rex, we
have temporarily joined forces in order to bring an early
end to the war.

The wings of the Adventurer's Guild, Futera, are a symbol
of freedom. Agonia couldn't allow them to be broken.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置
マップが見つからないため雰囲気が近いマップで仮置き
